property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] When I'm ready, I will put the Lure to start the fight

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] This time I can't decide when to start fighting. I need to act now.

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] If i remember correct, he said that i need to aim totally vertically, so the arrow with flare can reach high enough for the scout's vision.

property.name: text
property.value: You need to aim TOTALLY VERTICALLY.

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] Okay, need to shot the flare again.

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] Oh crap, not high enough.

property.name: text
property.value: Your arrow did not reach enough height.

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] I need to go outside, so the zombies can see me. After that, I can go back inside.

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Game Tip:[-] Your Party Needs To Shoot The Arrow At The Same Time

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] I've finished the first wave

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] I've finished the first wave

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] Why there is another horde ?

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] Oh shit! I'm still alive

property.name: text
property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] I've finished the first wave

property.value: | [FF6600]Player's Mind:[-] I've finished the first wave
